nodes.text: Gallshebbis Prime was a planet in the Nilgaard sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

New Republic officer Airen Cracken and his squad were once trapped by stormtroopers in a warehouse on the planet. Although they suffered losses, they were able to escape by recognizing the weaknesses in their opponents' equipment—namely the slow recycle time on the old BlasTech "PulseHammer" series repeating blaster—and exploiting it.
